Antoine Shimizu

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Status of Charles Hanrahan
Dear Sir,
Charles Hanrahan has an AVG of .234 at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of William Schwindt

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
